import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Sports = () => { const [fsport,setfsport]=useState("Select the favarout Sport"); const [fplayer,setfplayer]=useState("Select the favarout player"); console.log(fsport) console.log(fplayer) useEffect(()=>{ $("#fplyr").find("option").remove().end().append( ''); },[fsport]) localStorage.setItem("player",fplayer) localStorage.setItem("sport",fsport) return (
) } export default Sports
